page.title: 18Schools'Trip to France.
page.content: We arrived in Trouville at 15.00 hours The hotel was called Hotel Chatham and was run by an English couple.Lesa, Kerry and me shared a room,it was number 27 on the second floor. When we went into our room,Lesa and I unpacked our cases,but Kerry just left her clothes in her case. We got changed and went out to shop and walk along the beach. We had our supper in the hotel at 20.00 hours and the french food was very nice. We all liked the breakfasts of french bread,butter,jam and hot chocolate to drink. There was a swimming pool near the hotel which we went to several times.Each day we went out on a trip.These are some of the places we visited;Bayeux,Rouen, Arromanche and Horfleur. On the last night there was a disco arranged for us,which was great and finished about 23.00 hours.I hope I can go again.
